title: Person Role
description: A qualified association between a Person or OrganisationalUnit and an entity such as an ObjectGroup or MeasurementOrFact that enables the relationship to be contextualised with a specific role and time period. This class is aligned with the prov:qualifiedAttribution property (http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#qualifiedAttribution). It should be used instead of the Activity and PersonActivity classes to link a Person or OrganisationalUnit to an entity in situations where an activity is not know or is irrelevant, for example for describing a person's role within an organisation.

properties.name: endedAtTime
properties.description: The date or time when a Person stopped fulfilling the role specified in the role property.

properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Address class.

properties.name: hasPerson

properties.name: hasTemporalCoverage

properties.name: role
properties.description: A role played by a Person in the context of an entity such as an ObjectGroup, OrganisationalUnit or RecordLevel.

properties.name: startedAtTime
properties.description: The date or time when a Person started fulfilling the role specified in the role property.
